game.logic

Class LogicHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.logic.LogicHandler

  • public class LogicHandler
extends Object
    Handles the logic of the game.
    Author:
    Eero Kuurne

      • init

        public void init(AI player1AI,
                 AI player2AI)
        Builds decks, setups players and AIs, sets starting resources,picks starting cards and repaints the UI at the start of the game.
        Parameters:
        player1AI - Player 1's AI
        player2AI - Player 2's AI

        Parameters:

        player2AI - Player 2's AI

        public void changeTurn()
        What happens when the player clicks "End turn" button.

      • endTurn

        public int endTurn()
        Ends the turn.
        Returns:
        0 if game didn't end, 1 if player 1 wins, 2 if player 2 wins.

      • startTurn

        public void startTurn()
        Starts the turn.

      • checkGuardians

        public ArrayList<Integer> checkGuardians(Player player)
        Checks the slots of guardians in param player's table. Isn't used anywhere at the moment.
        Parameters:
        player - Which player's table is checked.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of the guardian slots.

      • checkPlayerTurn

        public Player[] checkPlayerTurn()
        Returns:
        Array of 2 Players where 1. slot is the player whose turn it is.
